ThingDef.label: surströmming
ThingDef.description:
A traditional dish known for its strong, distinctive aroma and powerful flavor. Prepared through a specialized curing process where fish is treated with salt, it is prized for its bold, pungent taste.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 surströmming requires fish, salt and steel, for a total value of 65.70, and sells for 15, giving a <color=#33CC33>56.20%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 2000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.08</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.1 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>150</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> Super hard to calculate, as it will depend on the fish acquired per day, which depends on size, pawn skill, etc.
